      <div className="verse-text"><a href="https://biblehub.com/hebrew/3605.htm" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">וּלְכֹל֙</a> (all) <a href="https://biblehub.com/hebrew/3027.htm" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">הַיָּ֣ד</a> (acts of power) <a href="https://biblehub.com/hebrew/2389.htm" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">הַחֲזָקָ֔ה</a> (the mighty) <a href="https://biblehub.com/hebrew/3605.htm" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">וּלְכֹ֖ל</a> (and) <a href="https://biblehub.com/hebrew/4172.htm" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">הַמּוֹרָ֣א</a> (awesome deeds) <a href="https://biblehub.com/hebrew/1419.htm" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">הַגָּד֑וֹל</a> (. . .) <a href="https://biblehub.com/hebrew/834.htm" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">אֲשֶׁר֙</a> (that) <a href="https://biblehub.com/hebrew/6213.htm" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">עָשָׂ֣ה</a> ([and no prophet who] performed) <a href="https://biblehub.com/hebrew/4872.htm" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">מֹשֶׁ֔ה</a> (Moses [did]) <a href="https://biblehub.com/hebrew/5869.htm" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">לְעֵינֵ֖י</a> (in the sight) <a href="https://biblehub.com/hebrew/3605.htm" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">כָּל־</a> (of all) <a href="https://biblehub.com/hebrew/3478.htm" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃</a> (Israel). </div>
    </div>

    <div className="column kjv">
      <div className="verse-ref">KJV (34:12)</div>
      <div className="verse-text">And in all that mighty hand, and in all the great terror which Moses showed in the sight of all Israel.</div>
    </div>
